Key Match Events: Jordan Poole scored 30 points to lead the host Washington Wizards to a 125-107 win over the Chicago Bulls.
Kyshawn George buried a 3-pointer to stretch the Wizards’ lead to 16 points, 100-84, with 10:20 remaining.
George pushed Washington’s lead to 20 points on a dunk shortly after, capping a 13-4 Wizards run that served to put the game out of reach early in the fourth quarter.
